title: If youre not thinking about your user
excerpt: …they’re likely not going to think much of you, either.

children.text: …they’re likely not going to think much of you, either.
That pretty much sums up the value of great design.
Not necessarily because it will lower your customer acquisition costs, or double your conversions.
But because being helpful, being friendly, and being useful are all factors that people look for in choosing who to engage with, buy from, and stick to, anytime and anywhere.
